snāpayet gandha toyena kuśa puṣpa udakena ca
hiraṇya ratna toyaiḥ ca mantra siddhaiḥ yathākramam
asaṃbhave tu dravyāṇām yathā saṃbhava saṃbhavaiḥ
kevalaiḥ mantra toyaiḥ vā snāpayet śraddhayā śivam
kalaśena atha śaṅkhena vardhanyā pāṇinā athavā
sa kuśena sa puṣpeṇa snāpayet mantra pūrvakam
pavamānena rudreṇa anilena tvaritena ca
liṅga sūkta ādi sūtraiḥ ca śirasā ātharvaṇena ca
ṛgbhiḥ ca sāmabhiḥ ca eva brahmabhiḥ ca api pañcabhiḥ
snāpayet devadeveśam śivena praṇavena ca
yathā devasya devyāḥ ca kuryāt snāna ādikam tathā

original: na tu kaścidviśeṣo'sti tatra tau sadṛśau yataḥ ||
analyzed: na tu kaścid viśeṣaḥ usti tatra tau sadṛśau yatas
prathamam devadevasya kuryāt snāna ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
paścāt devyai prakurvīta devadevasya śāsanāt
na ardhanārīśvare pūjye paurvāparyam ca vidyate
mantra tantra upacārāṇām liṅge vā anyatra vā kvacid
kṛtvā abhiṣekam liṅgasya śucinā ca sugandhinā
saṃmṛjya vāsasā dadyāt ambaram ca upavītakam

original: pādyamācamanaṃ cārghyaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca bhūṣaṇam |
analyzed: pādyam ācamanam ca arghyam gandham puṣpam ca bhūṣaṇam

original: dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ ca naivedyaṃ pānīyaṃ mukhaśodhanam ||
analyzed: dhūpam dīpam ca naivedyam pānīyam mukha śodhanam
punar ācamanīyam ca mukha vāsam tatas param
makuṭam ca śubham bhadram sarva ratnaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
bhūṣaṇāni vicitrāṇi mālyāni vividhāni ca

original: vyajanaṃ cāmaraṃ chatraṃ tālavṛntaṃ ca darpaṇam ||
analyzed: vyajanam cāmaram chatram tālavṛntam ca darpaṇam
da tvā nirājanam kuryāt sarva maṅgala nisvanaiḥ
gīta nṛtta ādibhiḥ ca eva jaya śabda rava anvitaiḥ

original: haimaṃ ca rājataṃ tāmrapātraṃ vā mṛṇmayaṃ śubhaiḥ |
analyzed: haimam ca rājatam tāmra pātram vā mṛṇmayam śubhaiḥ
padma ādyaiḥ śobhitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ bīja dadhi akṣata ādibhiḥ
citra vat svastika ādarśa vajraiḥ vahni ādi cihnitaiḥ

original: aṣṭa pradīpān parito nidhāyaikaṃ tu madhyataḥ |
analyzed: aṣṭa pradīpān paritas nidhāya ekam tu madhyatas
teṣu vāmā ādikāḥ cintyāḥ pūjyāḥ ca nava śaktayaḥ
kavacena samācchādya saṃrakṣya astreṇa sarvatas
dhenumudrām ca sandarśya pāṇibhyām pātram uddharet
athavā āropayet pātre pañca dīpān yathākramam

original: vidikṣvapi ca madhye ca dīpamekamathāpi vā ||
analyzed: vidikṣu api ca madhye ca dīpam ekam atha api vā
tatas tat pātram uddhṛtya liṅga ādeḥ upari kramāt

original: dadyādarghyaṃ tato mūrdhni bhasitaṃ ca sugandhitam |
analyzed: dadyāt arghyam tatas mūrdhni bhasitam ca sugandhitam

original: pānīyaṃ ca tato dattvā dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: pānīyam ca tatas dattvā dadyāt ācamanam tatas
pañca saugandhika upetam tāmbūlam ca nivedayet
prokṣayet prokṣaṇīyāni gāna nāṭya ādi kārayet
liṅga ādau śivayoḥ cintām kṛtvā śaktyā japet śivam
pradakṣiṇam praṇāmam ca stavam ca ātma samarpaṇam

original: arghyaṃ puṣpāñjaliṃ datvā badhvā mudrāṃ yathāvidhi |
analyzed: arghyam puṣpa añjalim da tvā badhvā mudrām yathāvidhi
paścāt kṣamāpayet devam udvāsya ātmani cintayet

original: tāvadeva paro dharmo bhāvena sukṛto bhavet |
analyzed: tāvat eva paraḥ dharmaḥ bhāvena su kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: yadi pāpena bhuñjīta svairaṃ tasya na niṣkṛtiḥ |
analyzed: yadi pāpena bhuñjīta svairam tasya na niṣkṛtiḥ
pramādena tu bhuktam ced tat udgīrya prayatnataḥ

śivasya ayutam abhyasya brahmacarya purassaram

original: p. 347) paredyuḥ śaktito datvā suvarṇādyaṃ śivāya vā |
analyzed: paredyus śaktitas da tvā suvarṇa ādyam śivāya vā
śiva bhaktāya vā kṛtvā mahā pūjām śuciḥ bhavet
anuktam ca atra pūjāyāḥ krama lopa bhaya ādi vā
yat tat anyat pravakṣyāmi samāsāt na tu vistarāt
haviḥ nivedanāt pūrvam dīpa dānāt anantaram
kuryāt āvaraṇa abhyarcām prāpte nīrājane tathā
tatra īśāna ādi sadya antam hṛd ādi astra antam eva ca
śivasya ca śivāyāḥ ca prathama āvaraṇe yajet

original: aiśānyāṃ pūrvabhāge vā dakṣiṇe cottare tathā |
analyzed: aiśānyām pūrva bhāge vā dakṣiṇe ca uttare tathā
paścime ca tathā āgneyyām aiśānyām nairṛte tathā

garbha āvaraṇam ākhyātam mantram sadya antam eva vā
hṛdaya ādi astra paryantam athavā api samarcayet

original: tadbahiḥ pūrvataḥ śakraṃ yamaṃ dakṣiṇato yajet ||
analyzed: tad bahis pūrvatas śakram yamam dakṣiṇatas yajet

original: varuṇaṃ vāruṇe bhāge dhanadaṃ cottare punaḥ |
analyzed: varuṇam vāruṇe bhāge dhana dam ca uttare punar
īśam aiśegnim āgneye nairṛte nirṛtim yajet
mārute mārutam viṣṇum nairṛte vidhim aiśvare
bahis padmasya vajra ādīni abja antāni āyatāni api

devam devīm ca saṃprokṣya sarva āvaraṇa devatāḥ

sarva āvaraṇa devānām sa abhidhānaiḥ namaḥ ntakaiḥ

original: puṣpaiḥ saṃpūjanaṃ kuryānnatyā smṛtyaiva ca kramāt |
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ saṃpūjanam kuryāt natyā smṛtyā eva ca kramāt

original: yāge dhyāne jape home bāhye cābhyantare'pi vā |
analyzed: yāge dhyāne jape home bāhye ca abhyantare pi vā

original: haviśca ṣaḍvidhaṃ devi śuddhaṃ mudgānnameva ca ||
analyzed: haviḥ ca ṣaḍvidham devi śuddham mudga annam eva ca

original: p. 348) pāyasaṃ dadhisaṃmiśraṃ gauḍaṃ ca kapilāghṛtam |
analyzed: pāyasam dadhi saṃmiśram gauḍam ca kapilā ghṛtam
eteṣu ekam anekam vā nānā vyañjana saṃyutam

analyzed: dalāni nāgavallyāḥ ca gaurāṇi ca śivāni ca

analyzed: śailam eva sitam cūrṇam na ati rūkṣam na ca uṣitam

analyzed: puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi eva patrāṇi ca śivāni ca
dukūla paṭa deva aṅga mayāni ca mitāni ca
nava ratna citāni eva tapanīya mayāni ca
vidyut valaya kalpāni bhūṣaṇāni viśeṣataḥ
sarvāṇi etāni karpūra niryāsa agaru candanaiḥ
su dhūpitāni puṣpa ādyaiḥ vāsitāni samantataḥ

original: ghṛtena madhunā caiva siddho dhūpaḥ praśasyate |
analyzed: ghṛtena madhunā ca eva siddhaḥ dhūpaḥ praśasyate

nityam pradīpitāḥ dīpāḥ śastāḥ karpūra varti jāḥ

original: pañcagavyaṃ ca mathitaṃ payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ tathā ||
analyzed: pañcagavyam ca mathitam payaḥ dadhi ghṛtam tathā
kapilā saṃbhavam śambhoḥ iṣṭam snāne ca pānake
āsanāni ca bhadrāṇi gaja danta mayāni ca
suvarṇa ratna citrāṇi citrāṇi āstaraṇāni ca
mṛdu upadhāna yuktāni sūkṣma tūla mayāni ca

original: p. 349) uccāvacāni ramyāṇi śayanāni sukhāni ca |
analyzed: uccāvacāni ramyāṇi śayanāni sukhāni ca

original: vastrapūtaṃ ca śītaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ snānapānayoḥ |
analyzed: vastra pūtam ca śītam ca viśiṣṭam snāna pānayoḥ
chatram śaśi nibham ślakṣṇam muktā dāma virājitam
nava ratna añcitam divyam hema daṇḍa manoharam
cāmare ca site sūkṣe cāmīkara pariṣkṛte
rājahaṃsa maya ākāre ratna daṇḍa upaśobhite
darpaṇam ca api su snigdham divya gandha anulepanam
samantāt ratna sañchannam sraj varaiḥ ca vibhūṣitam
āsya pṛṣṭha ādi deśeṣu ratna cāmīkara āñcitaḥ
kāhalāni ca ramyāṇi nānā nāda karāṇi ca
suvarṇa nirmitāni eva mauktika alaṅkṛtāni ca
bherī mṛdaṅga muraja timitā paṭaha ādayaḥ
samudra kalpa san nādāḥ kalpanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ

original: bhāṇḍānyapi ca ramyāṇi pātrāṇyapi ca kṛtsnaśaḥ ||
analyzed: bhāṇḍāni api ca ramyāṇi pātrāṇi api ca kṛtsnaśas
tad ādhārāṇi sarvāṇi sauvarṇāni eva sādhayet
ālayaḥ ca maheśasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ
rāja āvasatha vat kalpyaḥ śiva śāstra ukta lakṣaṇaḥ
ucca prākāra saṃbhinnam bhūdhara ākāra gopuram
aneka ratna sañchannam hema dvāra kavāṭakam
tapta jāmbūnada mayam ratna stambha śata āvṛtam
muktā dāma vitāna āḍhyam vidruma dvāra toraṇam
cāmīkara mayaiḥ dīptaiḥ makuṭaiḥ kumbha lakṣaṇaiḥ
alaṅkṛta śiraḥ bhāgam astrarājena cihnitaiḥ
rāja arhaka nivāsaiḥ ca rāja vīthi ādi śobhitaiḥ
rakṣitam prāṃśu śikharaiḥ prāsādaiḥ ca samantataḥ
āsthāna sthāna varyaiḥ ca sthitaiḥ dikṣu vidikṣu ca
atyanta alaṅkṛtam prāntam antara āvaraṇaiḥ iva
uttama strī sahasraiḥ ca nṛtta gīta viśāradaiḥ
veṇu vīṇā vidagdhaiḥ ca puruṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ yutam
rakṣitam rakṣakaiḥ vīraiḥ gaja vāji ratha anvitaiḥ
aneka puṣpa vāṭībhiḥ anekaiḥ ca sarovaraiḥ
dīrghikābhiḥ anekābhiḥ diś vidikṣu samāvṛtam
veda vedāṅga tattva jñaiḥ śiva śāstra viśāradaiḥ
śiva āśrama rataiḥ bhaktaiḥ śiva śāstra ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ
śāntaiḥ smita mukhaiḥ sphītaiḥ sat ācāra parāyaṇaiḥ
śaivaiḥ māheśvaraiḥ ca eva śrīmadbhiḥ sevitam dvijaiḥ
evam antar bahis vā atha yathāśakti vinirmite
sthāne śilā maye dānte dārave ca iṣṭakā maye

original: kevale mṛṇmaya vāpi puṇyāraṇye'pi vā girau |
analyzed: kevale vā api puṇya araṇye api vā girau

original: nadyāṃ devālaye'nyatra deśe vātha śubhe gṛhe ||
analyzed: nadyām devālayena ini atra deśe vā atha śubhe gṛhe

original: āḍhyo vātha daridro vā svakāṃ śaktimavañcayan |
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ vā atha daridraḥ vā svakām śaktim avañcayan

original: na tasya pratyavāyo'sti bhāvavaśyo yataḥ prabhuḥ ||

original: na tena phalabhāk sa syādbhaktirevātra kāraṇam ||

original: tāmasaṃ rājasaṃ vāpi sātvikaṃ bhāvameva vā |

original: ye vāñchanti mahābhogaṃ grāhyaṃ ca tridaśālaye |
analyzed: ye vāñchanti mahā bhogam grāhyam ca tridaśālaye
te īrcayanti sadā kālam harasya caraṇa ambujam
saubhāgyam kāntimat rūpam satyam tyāgaḥ prabhāva tā

original: śauryaṃ ca jagati khyātiḥ śivamarcayato bhavet ||
analyzed: śauryam ca jagati khyātiḥ śivam arcayataḥ bhavet
tasmāt sarvam śiva eka āhita mānasaḥ
śiva pūjā vidhim kuryāt yadi icchet śivam ātmanaḥ

original: tvaritaṃ jīvitaṃ yāti tvaritaṃ yāti yauvanam |
analyzed: tvaritam jīvitam yāti tvaritam yāti yauvanam
tvaritam vyādhiḥ abhyeti tasmāt pūjyaḥ sadā śivaḥ
yāvat na āyāti maraṇam yāvat na ākramate jarā
yāvat na indriya vaikalyam tāvat pūjaya śaṅkaram
na śiva arcana tulyaḥ asti dharmaḥ nyaḥ bhuvanatraye
iti vijñāya yatnena pūjanīyaḥ sadāśivaḥ
dvāra yāgam yavanikām parivāra bali kriyām

original: nityotsavaṃ ca kurvīta prāsāde yadi pūjayet ||
analyzed: nitya utsavam ca kurvīta prāsāde yadi pūjayet
haviḥ nivedanāt ūrdhvam svayam vā anucaraḥ api vā
prāsāda parivārebhyaḥ balim dadyāt yathākramam
nirgamya balideva ādi vādyaiḥ tad tad mukha āsthitaḥ

original: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ ca dīpaṃ ca dadyādannaṃ jalaiḥ saha ||
analyzed: puṣpam dhūpam ca dīpam ca dadyāt annam jalaiḥ saha
tatas dadyāt mahā pīṭhe tiṣṭhan balim udak mukhaḥ
tatas niveditam deve yat tat anna ādikam purā

original: p. 354) tatsarvaṃ sāvaśeṣaṃ vā caṇḍāya ca nivedayet |
analyzed: tat sarvam sa avaśeṣam vā caṇḍāya ca nivedayet
hutvā ca vidhivat paścāt pūjā śeṣam samāpayet
kṛtvā prayogam vidhivat yāvat mantra japam tatas
nitya utsavam prakurvīta yathā uktam śiva śāsane
vimale taijase pātre rakta padma upaśobhite
astram pāśupatam divyam tatra āvāhya samarcayet
śirasi āropya tat pātram dvijasya alaṅkṛtasya tu
nyasta astra vapuṣaḥ tena japta yaṣṭi dharasya ca
prāsāda parivārebhyaḥ bahis maṅgala nisvanaiḥ
nṛtta geya ādibhiḥ ca eva saha dīpa dhvaja ādibhiḥ

original: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā na drutaṃ na vilambitam |
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā na drutam na vilambitam
mahā pīṭham samāhṛtya tris pradakṣiṇa yogataḥ
punar praviṣṭaḥ dvāra sthaḥ yajamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
prāsāda abhyantaram nītvā hi astam udvāhayet tatas
pradakṣiṇa ādikam kṛtvā yathāpūrva uditam kramāt
pradāya ca aṣṭa puṣpāṇi pūjām atha samāpayet
upamanyuḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi śiva āśrama niṣeviṇām
sarveṣu api ca māseṣu pakṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: aṣṭabhyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ tathā parvaṇi ca kramāt ||
analyzed: aṣṭabhyām ca caturdaśyām tathā parvaṇi ca kramāt

original: ayane viṣuve caiva grahaṇe ca viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: ayane viṣuve ca eva grahaṇe ca viśeṣataḥ
kartavyā mahatī pūjā adhikā vā api bhaktitaḥ

original: māsi māsi yathānyāyaṃ brahmakūrcaṃ prasādhya tu |
analyzed: māsi māsi yathānyāyam brahmakūrcam prasādhya tu
snāpayitvā śivam tena pibet śeṣam upoṣitaḥ
brahmahatyā ādi doṣāṇām atīva mahatām api
niṣkṛtiḥ brahmakūrcasya pānāt na anyaḥ viśiṣyate
puṣyeṣu puṣya nakṣatre kuryāt nīrājanam vibhoḥ
māghe maghā ākhya nakṣatre pradadyāt ghṛtakambalam
phālgune ca uttara ante vai prārabheta mahā utsavam
caitre citrā pūrṇimāyām ḍolām kuryāt yathāvidhi
tu vaiśākhyām kuryāt puṣpa mahālayam
jyeṣṭhe mūla ākhya nakṣatre śīta sita kumbham pradāpayet
āṣāḍhe ca uttarāṣāḍhe pavitra āropaṇam tathā
śrāvaṇe prākṛta ādyāni maṇḍalāni prakalpayet

original: śraviṣṭhākhye tu nakṣatre prauṣṭhapadyāṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: śraviṣṭhā ākhye tu nakṣatre prauṣṭhapadyām tatas param
prokṣayet ca jala krīḍām pūrvāṣāḍhā āśraye dine
āśvayujyām tatas dadyāt pāyasam ca navodanam
agni kāryam ca tena eva kuryāt śatabhiṣaj dine
kārtikyām kṛttikā yoge dadyāt dīpa sahasrakam
mārgaśīrṣe tathā ārdrāyām ghṛtena snāpayet śivam
aśaktaḥ teṣu kāleṣu kuryāt utsavam eva vā
āsthānam vā mahā pūjām adhikam vā samarcanam
āvṛtte api ca kalyāṇe praśasteṣu api karmasu
daurmanasye durācāre dussvapne duṣṭa darśane

original: utpātādyaśubhe tasmin roge vā prabale'tha vā |
analyzed: utpāta ādi aśubhe tasmin roge vā vā
snāna pūjā japa dhyāna homa dāna ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
nimitta anuguṇāḥ kāryāḥ puraścaraṇa pūrvikāḥ
śivālaye ca vihate punar sandhānam ācaret
yaḥ evam śiva dharmiṣṭhaḥ vartate nityam udyataḥ
tasya eka janmanā muktim prayacchati maheśvaraḥ
etat yathottaram kuryāt nitya naimittikeṣu yaḥ
divyam śrīkaṇṭha nāthasya sthānam ādyam sa gacchati

original: p. 356) tatra bhuktvā mahābhogān kalpakoṭiśataṃ naraḥ |
analyzed: tatra bhuktvā mahā bhogān kalpa koṭi śatam naraḥ
kāla antare cyutaḥ tasmāt aumam kaumāram eva ca
saṃprāpya vaiṣṇavam brāhmam rudra lokam viśeṣataḥ

original: tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān ||
analyzed: tatra uṣitvā ciram kālam bhuktvā bhogān yathā īpsitān
punar ca ūrdhva gataḥ tasya tat etya sthāna pañcakam
śrīkaṇṭhāt jñānam āsādya punar śiva puram vrajet
ardha caryā rataḥ ca api dvis āvṛttya evam eva ca
paścāt jñānam samāsādya śiva sāyujyam āpnuyāt
ardha ardha caritaḥ yaḥ tu dehī deha kṣayāt param
aṇḍa antam ca ūrdhvam avyaktam atītya bhuvana dvayam
saṃprāpya pauruṣam raudram sthānam adri indra jāpateḥ
aneka yuga sāhasram bhuktāḥ bhogān anekadhā

original: puṇyakṣaye kṣitiṃ prāpya kule mahati jāyate |
analyzed: puṇya kṣaye kṣitim prāpya kule mahati jāyate
tatra api pūrva saṃskāra vaśena sa mahāmatiḥ
paśudharmān parityajya śiva dharma rataḥ bhavet
tad dharma gauravāt eva gatvā śiva puram punar
bhogān ca vipulān bhuktvā vidyeśvara puram vrajet

original: tatra vidyaiśvaraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhuktvā bhogān bahūn kramāt ||
analyzed: tatra vidyā aiśvaraiḥ sārdham bhuktvā bhogān bahūn kramāt
aṇḍasya antar bahis vā atha sakṛt āvartate punar

original: tato labdhvā śivajñānaṃ parāṃ bhaktimavāpya ca ||
analyzed: tatas labdhvā śiva jñānam parām bhaktim avāpya ca
śiva sādharmyam āsādya na bhūyas vinivartate
yaḥ ca atīva śive bhaktaḥ viṣaya āsakta cittavān
śiva dharmān asau kurvan na kurvan vā vimucyate
eka āvartaḥ dvis āvartaḥ tris āvartaḥ nivartakaḥ
na punar cakravartī syāt śiva dharma adhikāravān
tasmāt śiva āśritaḥ bhūtvā yena kena api hetunā
śiva dharme matim kuryāt śreyase ced kṛta udyamaḥ
na atra nirbadhayiṣyāmaḥ vayam kaṃcana kenacid
nirbandhebhyaḥ ativādebhyaḥ prakṛtyā etat na rocate
rocate vā parebhyaḥ tu puṇya saṃskāra gauravāt
saṃsāra kāraṇam yeṣām na praroḍhum alam bhavet
prakṛti anuguṇam tasmāt vimṛśya etat aśeṣatas
śiva dharmedhi kurvīta yadi icchet śivam ātmanaḥ
śiva dharme matim kuryāt śreyase ced kṛta udyamaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ vāya uttara
bhagavan tvad mukhāt eva śrutam śrati samam mayā
sva āśritānām śiva proktam nityanaimittikam tathā
idānīm śrotum icchāmi śiva dharma adhikāraṇam
kāmyam api asti ced karma vaktum arhasi sāṃpratam
upamanyuḥ
asti aihika phalam kiñcid āmuṣmika phalam tathā
aihika āmuṣmikam ca api tat ca pañcavidham punar
kiñcid kriyā mayam karma kiñcid karma tapaḥ mayam
japa dhyāna mayam kiñcid kiñcid sarva mayam tathā
kriyā mayam tathā bhinnam homa dāna arcana kramāt
sarvam śaktimatām eva na anyeṣām phala dam bhavet
śaktiḥ ca ādyā maheśasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ
tasmāt kāryāṇi sarvāṇi kuryāt ājñā dharaḥ sudhīḥ

original: atha vakṣyāmi kāmyaṃ hi cehāmutra phalapradam |
analyzed: atha vakṣyāmi kāmyam hi ca iha amutra phala pradam
śaivaiḥ māheśvaraiḥ ca eva kāryam antar bahis kramāt
śivaḥ maheśvaraḥ ca iti na atyantam iha bhidyate

original: yathā tathā na bhidyante śaivā māheśvarā api ||
analyzed: yathā tathā na bhidyante śaivāḥ māheśvarāḥ api

original: śivāśrite hi te śaivā jñānayajñaratā narāḥ |
analyzed: śiva āśrite hi te śaivāḥ jñāna yajña ratāḥ narāḥ
māheśvarāḥ samākhyātā karma yajña ratāḥ bhuvi
tasmāt abhyantare kuryuḥ śaivāḥ māheśvarāḥ bahis
na tu prayogaḥ bhidyeta vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ
parīkṣya bhūmim vidhivat gandha varṇa rasa ādibhiḥ
manaḥ abhilaṣite ratna vitāna vitata ambare
su pradīpte mahī pṛṣṭhe darpaṇa udara sannibhe
prācīm utkhātayet pūrvam śāstra dṛṣṭena vartmanā
eka hastam dvi hastam vā maṇḍalam parikalpayet
ālikhet vilasat padmam aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam
ratna hema ādibhiḥ śrūrṇaiḥ yathā saṃbhava sambhṛtaiḥ
prativāraṇa saṃyuktam bahu śobhā samanvitam
daleṣu siddhayaḥ kalpyāḥ kesareṣu sa śaktikāḥ
rudrāḥ vāma ādayaḥ tu aṣṭau pūrva ādi dalataḥ kramāt

original: karṇikāyāṃ ca vairāgyaṃ bījeṣu nava śaktayaḥ |
analyzed: karṇikāyām ca vairāgyam bījeṣu nava śaktayaḥ

original: kande śivātmako dharmo nāle jñānaṃ śivāśrayam ||
analyzed: kande śiva ātmakaḥ dharmaḥ nāle jñānam śiva āśrayam
karṇikā upari vāhneyam maṇḍalam sauram aindavam
śiva vidyā ātma tattva ākhyam tattva trayam atas paras
sarva āsana upari sukham vicitra kusuma anvitam
param vyoma avakāśam ca vidyayā atīva bhāsvaram
parikalpya āsanam mūrtau āvāhya parameśvaram
pañca āvaraṇa saṃyuktam pūjayet ambayā saha
śuddha sphaṭika saṅkāśam prasannam śītala dyutim
vidyut valaya saṅkāśa jaṭā makuṭa bhūṣitam
śārdūla carma vasanam kiñcid smita mukha ambujam
ratna padma dala prakhya pāṇi pāda tala adharam
sarva lakṣaṇa sampannam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
divya āyudha vadharaiḥ yuktam divya gandha anulepanam
pañcavaktram daśa bhujam candra khaṇḍa śikhāmaṇim
asya pūrva mukham saumyam bāla arka sadṛśa prabham
tri locana aravinda āḍhyam bāla indu kṛta śekharam
dakṣiṇam nīla jīmūta samāna rucira prabham
bhrukuṭī kuṭilam ghoram rakta vṛtta īkṣaṇa trayam
daṃṣṭrā karālam durdharṣam sphurita adhara pallavam
uttamam vidruma prakhyam nīla alaka vibhūṣitam
sa vilāsam triṇayanam ca ṛndra ardha kṛta śekharam
paścimam pūrṇa candra ābham locana tritaya ujvalam
candra lekhā dharam saumyam manda smita manoharam
pañcamam sphaṭika prakhyam vidyut lekhā samujjvalam
atīva saumyam utphulla locana tritaya ujjvalam
dakṣiṇe śūla paraśu vajra khaḍga anala ujjvalam
savye ca nāgarāca ghaṇṭā pāśa aṅkuśa ujjvalam
nivṛttyā jānu paryanta māna ābheḥ ca pratiṣṭhayā
ākaṇṭham vidyayā tadvat ālalāṭam tu śāntayā
tad ūrdhvam śānti atīta ākhya kalayā parayā tathā
īśāna makuṭam devam puruṣa ākhyam purātanam
aghora hṛdayam tadvat vāma guhyam maheśvaram
sadya pādam ca tad mūrtim aṣṭatriṃśat kalā mayam
mātṛkā mayam īśānam pañca brahma mayam tathā
oṅkāra ākhya mayam ca eva haṃsa śaktyā samanvitam
pañca akṣara mayam devam ṣaṣ akṣara mayam tu vā
aṅga ṣaṭka yutam ca eva jāti ṣaṭka samanvitam
tathā icchā ātmikayā śaktyā samārūḍha aṅka maṇḍalam
jñāna ākhyayā dakṣiṇatas vāmatas tu kriyā ākhyayā
tattva traya mayam sākṣāt vidyā mūrtim sadāśivam
mūrti mūlena saṅkalpya sakalīkṛtya ca kramāt
saṃpūjya ca yathānyāyam arghya tad mūla vidyayā
mūrtimantam śivam sākṣāt śaktyā paramayā saha
tatra āvāhya mahādevam sat asat vyakti varjitam
pañca upacaraṇam kṛtvā pūjayet parameśvaram
brahmabhiḥ ca ṣaḍaṅgaiḥ ca tatas mātṛkayā saha
praṇavena śivena eva śakti yuktena ca kramāt
sa aṅgena ca tathā anyaiḥ ca devamantraiḥ ca kṛtsnaśas

original: pūjayet paramaṃ devaṃ kevalena śivena vā ||
analyzed: pūjayet paramam devam kevalena śivena vā
pādya ādi mukha vāsa antam kṛtvā prasthāpanam vinā
pañca āvaraṇa pūjām tu prārabheta yathākramam
vāyo uttara

original: tatrādau śivayoḥ pārśve dakṣiṇe vāmataḥ kramāt |
analyzed: tatra ādau śivayoḥ pārśve dakṣiṇe vāmatas kramāt
gandha ādyaiḥ arcayet pūrvam devau heramba ṣaṇmukhau
tatas brahmāṇi paritas īśāna ādi yathākramam
sa śaktikāni sadya antam prathama āvaraṇe yajet
ṣaṣ aṅgāni api tatra eva hṛdaya ādīni anukramāt
śivasya ca śivāyāḥ ca vāhneya ādi samarcayet
tatra vāmā ādikān rudrān aṣṭau vāmā ādi śaktibhiḥ

original: arcayedvā na vā paścāt pūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt ||
analyzed: arcayet vā na vā paścāt pūrva ādi paritas kramāt
prathama āvaraṇam proktam mayā te raghunandana
dvitīya āvaraṇam prītyā procyate śraddhayā śruṇu

original: p. 361) anantaṃ pūrvadikpatre tacchaktiṃ tasya vāmataḥ |
analyzed: anantam pūrva diś pattre tad śaktim tasya vāmatas
sūkṣmam dakṣiṇa diś patre śaktyā saha samarcayet
tatas paścima diś patre śaktyā saha śiva uttamam
tathā eva uttara diś patre ca ekanetram samarcayet
ekarudram ca tad śaktim paścāt īśāna diś dale
trimūrtim tasya śaktim ca pūjayet agni diś dale

original: śrīkaṇṭhaṃ nair-ṛte patre tacchaktiṃ tasya vāmataḥ |
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭham nairṛte patre tad śaktim tasya vāmatas
tathā eva mārute patre śikhaṇḍīśam samarcayet
dvitīya āvaraṇe ca ijyāḥ sarvatas cakravartinaḥ
tṛtīya āvaraṇe pūjyāḥ śaktibhiḥ ca aṣṭamūrtayaḥ
aṣṭasu kramatas dikṣu pūrva ādi paritas kramāt
bhavaḥ śarvaḥ tathā īśānaḥ rudraḥ paśupatiḥ tathā

original: ugro bhīmo mahādeva ityaṣṭau mūrtayaḥ kramāt |
analyzed: ugraḥ bhīmaḥ mahādevaḥ iti aṣṭau mūrtayaḥ kramāt
antarā antarataḥ ca eva mahādeva ādayaḥ kramāt
śaktibhiḥ saha saṃpūjyāḥ tatra ekādaśa mūrtayaḥ
mahādevaḥ śivaḥ rudraḥ śaṅkaraḥ nīlalohitaḥ
īśānaḥ vijayaḥ bhīmaḥ devadevaḥ bhavodbhavaḥ
kapālī īśaḥ ca kathyante tathā ekādaśa mūrtayaḥ
tatra aṣṭau prathamam pūjyāḥ āgneya ādi yathākramam
devadevaḥ pūrva patre aiśānyām agni gocare
bhava udbhavaḥ tayoḥ madhye kapālī īśaḥ tatas param
tasmin āvaraṇe bhūyas vṛṣa indram puratas yajet
nandinam dakṣiṇe tasya mahākālam tathā uttare
śāstāram vahni diś patre mātṝḥ dakṣiṇa diś dale

original: gajāsyaṃ nair-ṛte patre ṣaṇmukhaṃ vāruṇe tataḥ |
analyzed: gajāsyam nairṛte patre ṣaṇmukham vāruṇe tatas
jyeṣṭhām vāyudale gaurīm uttare caṇḍam aiśvare
śāstṛ nandīśayoḥ madhye muni indram vṛṣabham yajet
mahākālasya uttaratas piṅgalam tu samarcayet
śāstṛ mātṛ samūhasya madhye bhṛṅgīśvaram yajet
mātṛ vighneśayoḥ madhye vīrabhadram samarcayet
skanda vighneśayoḥ madhye yajet devīm sarasvatīm
jyeṣṭhā kumārayoḥ madhye śriyam sāmba śiva arcitām
jyeṣṭhā gaṇāmbayoḥ madhye mahā moṭīm samarcayet
gaṇa ambā caṇḍayoḥ madhye devīm durgām prapūjayet
atra eva āvaraṇe bhūyas śiva anucara saṃhatim
rudra pramatha bhūta ākhyām vividhām ca sa śaktikām
śivāyāḥ ca sakhī vargam samantataḥ
evam tṛtīya āvaraṇe vitate pūjite sati
caturtha āvaraṇam dhyātvā bahis tasya samarcayet
bhānuḥ pūrva dale pūjyaḥ dakṣiṇe caturānanaḥ
caturṇām api devānām pṛthak āvaraṇāni atha
tad pūjā anantaram kuryāt tad śāstra ukta prakārataḥ
athavā bhānum abhyarcya prathama āvaraṇe yajet
tasya aṅgāni ṣaḍ eva ādau dīptā ādyābhiḥ ca śaktibhiḥ

original: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā kramāt ||
analyzed: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtiḥ vimalā kramāt
amoghā vidyutā ca eva pūrva ādi paritas sthitāḥ
dvitīya āvaraṇe pūjyāḥ catasraḥ mūrtayaḥ kramāt
pūrva ādi uttara paryantāḥ śaktayaḥ ca tatas param
ādityaḥ bhāskaraḥ bhānuḥ raviḥ ca iti anupūrvaśas

kāladaṇḍa ādi āyudhāni sarveṣām ātmanām punar
samavarti tayā nītvā puṇya apuṇye vicārya ca
puṇyena svar gatim teṣām pāpena naraka sthitim
yātanāḥ ca api narake tad tad pāpa anurūpataḥ
sabhyān api mahābhāgān madhyasthān mahita ojasaḥ

original: citraguptaṃ ca kāryasthaṃ cakārāsya śivaḥ svayam |
analyzed: citraguptam ca kārya stham cakāra asya śivaḥ svayam
tad ādi dharmarāj bhogī saṃyaminyām śiva ājñayā
anubhūya amitām lakṣmīm āste idyā api pratāpavān
gokarṇe ca śiva sthāne nirṛtiḥ parameśvaram
samabhyarcya tatas prāpa prasannāt jagatīpateḥ
dakṣiṇa apara dhikpāla bhāvam ca vidhi pūrvakam
yajatām phala dātṛ tvam khaḍgam ca api āyudha uttamam
abhiṣiktaḥ ca ādhipatye rakṣasām api sarvaśas
adya api anubhavan āste dattām devena sampadam
jambu araṇye samabhyarcya pracetāḥ parameśvaram
prāpa arṇava ādhipatyam ca yādasām api apām api
vāhanam ca api makaram abhiṣeka purassaram
paścima āśā pati tvam ca pāśa ādyaiḥ āyudhaiḥ samam

original: tathaiva labdhā tatsarvaṃ mahatā prābhavena saḥ ||
analyzed: tathā eva labdhā tat sarvam mahatā prābhavena saḥ
santuṣṭaḥ mahā tejāḥ pratāpavān
vāyuḥ dakṣiṇa kailāse kālahasti mahā pure
samabhyarcya mahādevam upacāraiḥ an anya dhīḥ
varam āpa maheśānāt prasannāt īśvara īśvarāt
paścima uttara diś svāmye ca abhiṣiktaḥ pratāpavān
vāyūnām ādhipatyam ca dhvaja ādi āyudha pūrvakaiḥ

original: mṛgaṃ ca vāhanaṃ lebhe so'dyāpyapratimo bhuvi |
analyzed: mṛgam ca vāhanam lebhe saḥ udyāpya pratimaḥ bhuvi
siddheśvara abhidhe siddhavaṭe saṃpūjya śaṅkaram
kuberaḥ parayā bhaktyā varān āpa maheśvarāt
uttarāśā pati tve ca paṭṭabaddhaḥ babhūva ca

original: nidhīnāṃ ca navānāṃ ca patitvaṃ cāpi puṣpakam |
analyzed: nidhīnām ca navānām ca pati tvam ca api puṣpakam
nimānam api deva īśāt yakṣa īśa tvam ca vāhanam
mahā pratāpa saṃyuktaḥ vartata idyā api tad sakhā
īśānaḥ upi mahādevam kamala ālaya vāsinam
saṃpūjya patra puṣpa ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ anekadhā
prasannena tadā pṛṣṭaḥ kā apekṣā iti pinākinā
praṇamya varayāmāsa varān agryān an anya dhīḥ
samānāni ca nāmāni samāna vapuḥ āyudham
tat cihnam yat yat asti śivasya tu

original: vṛṣaṃ ca vāhanaṃ tadvatprāgudīcyā diśaḥ patiḥ ||
analyzed: vṛṣam ca vāhanam tadvat prāc udīcyāḥ diśaḥ patiḥ

original: p. 393) etatsarvamasau lebhe saṃprārthyeśaṃ svayaṃ vaśī |
analyzed: etat sarvam asau lebhe saṃprārthya īśam svayam vaśī
anta idhikārasya punar sāyujyam parameśvaraḥ
da tvā antardhānam āpeśaḥ saḥ upi adya api pratāpavān
kāñcyām eva purā sūryaḥ kamalaiḥ īśvara īśvaram
abhyarcya ananyayā bhaktyā prasannāt āptavān varam
ṛk yajuḥ sāma vedānām maṇḍale vasatim sadā
tad arham ca ratham leme sapta aśva parimaṇḍitam
grahāṇām ādhipatyam ca jyotiḥ cakram ca sarvatas
kṛta abhiṣekaḥ devena dinānām adhipaḥ bhavat
kumbha koṇam anuprāpya candraḥ śaṅkara vallabhaḥ
bhaktyā abhyarcya mahādevam tatra muktā mayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
varam āpa śivāt prītāt nakṣatra īśa tvam adbhutam
himāṃśu tvam dvija īśa tvam oṣadhi īśa tvam eva ca
vibhūṣaṇa tvam īśasya su durlabham avāpa saḥ
pratyaham tau ubhau meroḥ pradakṣiṇa parau mudā
śiva āvāsasya satatam grahaiḥ anyaiḥ śiva priyaiḥ

original: bhaumo budho guruḥ śukro śaniścaite ca pañca ca |
analyzed: bhaumaḥ budhaḥ guruḥ śukro śaniḥ ca ete ca pañca ca

original: madhyārjune ca hālāsye setau vaṭavane mudā ||
analyzed: madhyārjune ca hālāsye setau vaṭa vane mudā
veda araṇye ca pañca ete pañcasu api pinākinam
prasādya parayā bhaktyā prasannāt apire varān
ūrdhvam maṇḍalataḥ soma sūryayoḥ upari sthitim
ādhipatyam ca su mahat lokānām sukha duḥkhayoḥ
sarvaiḥ api ca pūjya tvam sarva upadrava śāntaye
deva asurāṇām ācāryau guru śukrau kṛtau tadā
īśvareṇa eva devena prasannena muni īśvarāḥ
sapta api ṛṣayaḥ pūrvam devadevam sabhāpatim

original: p. 394) cidambare samabhyarjya madhyedabhraṃ sadaḥ prabhum |
analyzed: cit ambare samabhyarjya madhye idam abhram sadaḥ prabhum
avāpuḥ varam īśānāt grahāṇām upari sthitim
punar deha antare muktim mumuduḥ prāpyate param
sarva śāstra artha vijñāna kuśalāḥ ca tad ājñayā
vasiṣṭha ādyāḥ mahātmānaḥ tedya api mahita ojasaḥ
sūtaḥ śam sam
dhruvaḥ auttānapādiḥ tu kāśyām viśveśvaram śivam
samabhyarcya maheśānāt prasannāt āptavān varam
nakṣatra muni mukhyānām maṇḍala ūrdhva sthitim parām

original: medhībhūto grahāṇāṃ ca bhrāmayanneva tān mudā |
analyzed: medhībhūtaḥ grahāṇām ca bhrāmayan eva tān mudā
sarva upari kṛta āvāsaḥ tiṣṭhati adya api asaṃbhraman

original: kumbhakoṇe purā śeṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhogināṃ varaḥ |
analyzed: kumbha koṇe purā śeṣaḥ sarveṣām bhoginām varaḥ

original: prasādya devadeveśaṃ bhuvo bhāraṃ babhāra vai ||
analyzed: prasādya devadeveśam bhuvaḥ bhāram babhāra vai
mahā pratāpa saṃyuktaḥ vahatedyā api ayam dharām
evam sthāneṣu sarveṣu bhūmyām parvata mūrdhani
nadīnām ca eva tīreṣu devāḥ ca munayaḥ usurāḥ
siddhāḥ ca yakṣāḥ vidyādhara mahā uragāḥ
kinnarāḥ ca muni śreṣṭhāḥ tathā kiṃpuruṣa ādayaḥ
manuṣyāḥ ca mahādevam bhakti ārādhya sadāśivam
svam svam padam anuprāpya sukhinaḥ mudam āpire
nāgānām garuḍānām ca gandharva uraga rakṣasām
kinnarāṇām manuṣyāṇām kiṃpuruṣāṇām ca sarvaśas
prāpuḥ īśa varāt te te svādhipatyam akuṇṭhitam
meghānām adhipāḥ ca anye diggajāḥ ye ca kecana

original: aṣṭau ca ye mahānāgāḥ saptāpi ca mahīdharāḥ ||
analyzed: aṣṭau ca ye mahā nāgāḥ sapta api ca mahīdharāḥ

original: ye ye'dhipāḥ sthitā yeṣāṃ te te devaprasādataḥ |
analyzed: ye yedhipāḥ sthitāḥ yeṣām te te deva prasādataḥ
labdha ādhipatyāḥ vijñeyāḥ na anyathā muni sattamāḥ
tasmāt śreyaḥ ṛthibhiḥ sarvaiḥ sva ātmanaḥ manuja uttamaiḥ
śiva pūjā sadā kāryā bhukti mukti phala pradā
śiva pūjā prabhāvena kecid siddhāḥ babhūvire
navā api siddhāḥ vikhyātāḥ yoginaḥ kapila ādayaḥ
aneke loka kartāraḥ hi aneke nitya tām gatāḥ
śiva lokam yayuḥ kecid sālokyam apare janāḥ
sāmīpyam api sārūpyam sāyujyam api sūrayaḥ
deva asura manuṣyeṣu śiva pūjā prabhāvataḥ
adhika aiśvarya saṃpannā vikhyātā bhuvanatraye
kecid aiśvarya lābhena muktāḥ moha vaśam gatāḥ
bhraṣṭāḥ punar ca saṃsārāt śivam pūrva vat āpire
jaya arthinaḥ ca bahavaḥ samabhyarcya jagatpatim

original: vijitya śatrūn saṅgrāme śaśāsuḥ pṛthivīṃ punaḥ |
analyzed: vijitya śatrūn saṅgrāme śaśāsuḥ pṛthivīm punar
bala arthinaḥ api bahavaḥ balam su bahu lebhire
putrān putra arthinaḥ nye pi dārān api manoharān
paśu kāmāḥ paśūn aśvān aśva kāmāḥ ca lebhire
saubhāgyam kāntimat rūpam tyāgam satyam parākramam

original: prasiddhiṃ ca jagatyasmin sarvamiṣṭaṃ ca lebhire ||
analyzed: prasiddhim ca jagati asmin sarvam iṣṭam ca lebhire
artheṣu eteṣu anekeṣu sa itihāseṣu kāścana
saṅgraheṇa mahābhāgāḥ varṇyante śruṇuta adhunā
sūtaḥ śam sam
viṣṇuḥ purā purā arātim ārādhya puruṣam param
ṛṣi śāpa samudbhuta vinipātān anekaśas
nirdhūya abhīṣṭa putra strī rājya lābham avāptavān
teṣu kāṃścid itīhāsān mahā puṇyān vadāmi vaḥ
sūtaḥ
ekadā kalahe vṛtte brahma viṣṇvoḥ parasparam

original: kartāhaṃ jagatāṃ na tvamahaṃ na tvamiti krudhā ||
analyzed: kartā aham jagatām na tvam aham na tvam iti krudhā
tayoḥ ahaṃkṛteḥ śāntim kurvan sarva īśvara īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: utpādya bhairavaṃ tena maṇḍalasthaṃ svayaṃ raveḥ ||
analyzed: utpādya bhairavam tena maṇḍala stham svayam raveḥ
nakha agreṇa vidheḥ tasya pañcamam mūrdhva sūrdhva gam
urvāruka phalam yadvat komalam līlayā īśvaraḥ
saṃchidya tad kapālena bhairaveṇa dhṛtena ca
viṣṇoḥ ahaṃkṛteḥ śātim rakta bhikṣā chalena vai
vinodayiṣyan bhikṣā artham prerayāmāsa bhairavam

original: viṣṇuḥ sirāṃ lalāṭāgrācchitvā raktaṃ nijaṃ dadau ||
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ sirām lalāṭa agrāt śitvā raktam nijam dadau
raktasya virahāt mūrchām avāpa puruṣottamaḥ
punar ca bhairava indrasya kara sparśena nirvyathaḥ
mūrchām vihāya sahasā labdha saṃjñaḥ punar hariḥ
ahaṅkāraḥ kṛtaḥ asmābhiḥ śāsitāḥ tena vai vayam
tad pāpa vinivṛtti artham śiva pūjām prakurmahe
madhyārjunam samāsādya samabhyarcya jagadgurum
mene kṛtārtham ātmānam pūtam sarveśvara arcanāt
kṛpayā devadevasya prasannasya pinākinaḥ
viṣṇuḥ lokam yathāpūrvam jagāma garuḍena saḥ
punar api ekādā viṣṇuḥ ahaṅkāra mada uddhataḥ
brahmaṇā spardhamānā usā abīśvaraḥ ham iti krudhā
mahā liṅga ākṛteḥ mūlam a dṛṣṭvā punar utthitaḥ

original: praṇamya sa ca devānāmaśṛṇvan vacanaṃ hitam |
analyzed: praṇamya sa ca devānām aśṛṇvan vacanam hitam
tad pāpa vinivṛtti artham aruṇācalam āśritaḥ

original: p. 397) tatreśvaraṃ samārādhya prasādenāsya vai vibhoḥ |
analyzed: tatra īśvaram samārādhya prasādena asya vai vibhoḥ
aparādha vimukta ātmā jagāma bhavanam svakam
bhṛgu śāpa vimocanam
punar ca api akārot viṣṇuḥ ekadā asura nigraham
parājaye tu devānām deva asura mahā āhave

original: tadānīṃ tumule yuddhe viṣṇunā sūditā bhṛśam |
analyzed: tadānīm tumule yuddhe viṣṇunā sūditāḥ bhṛśam
bhṛgu āśramam samāsādya bhṛgu patnīm tapasvinīm

tad āśramam api prāpa viṣṇuḥ cakradharaḥ svayam
saṃharan asurān tatra bhṛgu patnyā nivāritaḥ
na eva āśramaḥ praveṣṭavyaḥ tvayā asat nihite munau

original: na hantavyā na hantavyā ditijā madupāsakāḥ |
analyzed: na hantavyāḥ na hantavyāḥ ditijāḥ mad upāsakāḥ

original: mayā dattābhayāḥ sarve mā mā hiṃsīrjanārdana ||
analyzed: mayā dattā abhayāḥ sarve mā mā hiṃsīḥ janārdana
dṛṣṭvā enām saṃbhrama āviṣṭaḥ jagatām iti hi krudhā
cakreṇa saṃharan daityān ciccheda ca śiraḥ tadā
teṣām abhayadātryāḥ ca bhṛgu patnyāḥ janārdanaḥ
nirgate ca tatas tasmāt āśramāt madhusūdane

original: dadarśa bhṛgurabhyetya daityaiḥ saha nijāṃ priyām |
analyzed: dadarśa bhṛguḥ abhyetya daityaiḥ saha nijām priyām
nikṛtta śirasam jñāna dṛṣṭyā vijñāya mādhavam

original: cukrodha haraye'tyarthaṃ hantre daityaiḥ striyā api |
analyzed: cukrodha harayā iti artham hantre daityaiḥ striyāḥ api
aśapat viṣṇum avanau janmāni asya astu koṭiśas
tatra tatra striyā ca api viyogaḥ ustu ati duḥkha daḥ

original: jagatyasyaiva ye bhaktāḥ santu pāṣaṇḍinastu te ||
analyzed: jagatyasya eva ye bhaktāḥ santu pāṣaṇḍinaḥ tu te
śaptvā evam ātmanaḥ patnīm sandhāya ujjīvya vidyayā
mṛtasaṃjīvinī iti eva siddhayā parameśvarāt
tatas viṣṇuḥ samākarṇya bhīta bhīta usura ardanaḥ
tad śāpa vid nivṛtti artham kāñcīm abhyetya kāma dām
saṃpūjya devadeveśam dṛṣṭvā devam vṛṣa upari
praṇamya prārthayat śāpa mokṣam bhītena cetasā
mad bhaktaiḥ yat kṛtam viṣṇo taiḥ kartavyam tat anyathā

original: ahaṃ na pārayāmyeva pratijñaiṣā mayā kṛtā ||
analyzed: aham na pārayāmi eva pratijñā eṣā mayā kṛtā
iti keśavam ābhāṣya harikeśaḥ smayan iva
bhṛgum āha mahādevaḥ smṛti mātra āgatam munim
vimocaya harim śāpāt bhṛgo bahu jani pradāt
mad arcana ratam viddhi bhaktam ca muni sattama
daśa astu janma tat viṣṇoḥ ekasmin tatra janmani
striyā viyuktā uticiram duḥkhī bhavatu na anyatas
mad ājñayā kuruṣva evam mad bhaktānām tvam agraṇīḥ
tathā astu iti muniḥ prāha praṇamya parameśvaram
tadā punar umākāntam ramākāntaḥ praṇamya tam
prārthayāmāsa bhagavan daśasu api ca janmasu
mama ajñāna nivṛti artham nigraha anugrahau kuru
tvam eva devadeveśa dayālo bhakta vatsala
tat upaśrutya bhagavān astu iti antardhim āyayau
nārāyaṇaḥ api bhagavān svam eva āśramam āśrayat
punar ca api ekadā viṣṇuḥ veda uddharaṇa karmaṇe
śāpharīm yonim āsādya saṃhariṣyan sa taskaram

original: vedānāṃ somakaṃ daityaṃ vinigṛhya ca līlayā |
analyzed: vedānām somakam daityam vinigṛhya ca līlayā
vedān ca vedhase da tvā yathāpūrvam janārdanaḥ

original: p. 399) tato bhītā viriñcādyāḥ śaṅkaraṃ lokaśaṃkaram |
analyzed: tatas bhītāḥ viriñca ādyāḥ śaṅkaram loka śaṃkaram

kaivarta tām samāsādya mādhavam matsya rūpiṇam
vinigṛhya akṣi yugalam kuruvinda maṇi prabham
nakha agreṇa samādāya śiva agre vinivedayan
nidhāya etat namaskṛtya tasthau yogī kṛtāñjaliḥ
tadā brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ mahādevam samarcayan
vayam matsyena ghoreṇa pīḍitāḥ bhṛśam īśvara

gata mohaḥ punar viṣṇuḥ dhyātvā devam janārdanaḥ
śiva pūjā prabhāvena pūrvam somakam ardayan
mohena eva tatas paścāt jaganti tamasā āvṛtaḥ
śāsitaḥ asmi jagaddhātrā kṛtārthaḥ asmi tatas kṛtaḥ
etadā ago nivṛtti artham pūjayiṣyāmi śaṅkaram

original: iti kāñcīpurīṃ prāpya pūjayāmāsa tatra tam |
analyzed: iti kāñcī purīm prāpya pūjayāmāsa tatra tam

vareṇa chandayāmāsa matsya rūpam jagatpatiḥ

original: mamāstu deva kṛpayā matsyarūpaṃ tu māṃ dvijāḥ |

original: anena kacchapāsthnā me kiṃ bhāvi vadatādhunā |

saṃbhūya taiḥ ca saṃmantrya saṃtoṣeṇa mahīyasā
nirmame nagarīḥ teṣām ayaḥ rajata kāñcanaiḥ
gṛhān ca nava ratna āḍhyān gopurāṇi mahānti ca
vīthīḥ ca vividhāḥ tatra maṇi toraṇa maṇḍitāḥ
te samālokya nagarīḥ tisraḥ devetaraiḥ saha
śaśaṃsuḥ ca mayam bhūyas santoṣam atulam gatāḥ
papracchuḥ ātmanām ca api tam eva ete hita ahitam
sa tān uvāca hṛṣṭa ātmā vidyunmāli mukhān ayam
yuṣmābhiḥ ca varaḥ labdhaḥ nitya tva sadṛśaḥ usurāḥ
ekaḥ eva sura śreṣṭhaḥ bāṇena ekena mṛtyu daḥ
sahasra vatsarasya ante iti idam buddhi kauśalam
asmin arthe itra śruṇvantu mayā uktam tu suretarāḥ

original: devaśreṣṭhaḥ smṛto loke vede ca parameśvaraḥ |
analyzed: deva śreṣṭhaḥ smṛtaḥ loke vede ca parameśvaraḥ
kṣipreṣuḥ sthiradhanvā iti svadhāmā ca jagatpatiḥ
āṣāḍhaḥ sahamānaḥ ca bhaktaḥ bhakta janeṣu saḥ
tigma āyudhaḥ ca vedeṣu sarvatra paripaṭhyate
tasya pūjā sadā kāryā niyamena akhilātmabhiḥ

original: p. 429) upasargāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti śatravo vyādhayo grahāḥ |
analyzed: upasargāḥ kṣayam yānti śatravaḥ vyādhayaḥ grahāḥ
manaḥ prasanna tām yāti pūjyamāne maheśvare
yuṣmābhiḥ arcanīyā usau rudraḥ bandhu janaiḥ saha
tasmin saṃpūjyamāne tu śaṅkare loka śaṃkare

original: yuṣmākaṃ hiṃsakā ye tu hiṃsitāḥ syuśca tena te ||
analyzed: yuṣmākam hiṃsakāḥ ye tu hiṃsitāḥ syuḥ ca tena te
sa śivaḥ sarva jantūnām bhukti mukti phala pradaḥ
tasmāt yūyam tam eva īśam arcayitvā dine dine
liṅga mūrtau jagannātham bhakti bhāvena suvratāḥ
aiśvaryam asurāḥ nityam saṃprāpnuta saparyayā
vijayaḥ ca sadā kālam yuṣmad kara tale sthitaḥ

original: tathaiva te pratiśrutya vacanaṃ tasya comiti ||
analyzed: tathā eva te pratiśrutya vacanam tasya ca ūm iti
yayācire ca liṅgāni mayam aiśāni te surāḥ

original: pratyekaṃ sa ca liṅgāni kalpayāmāsa vai kṣaṇāt ||
analyzed: pratyekam sa ca liṅgāni kalpayāmāsa vai kṣaṇāt
gṛhe gṛhe īrcayanti īśam asurāḥ bhasma bhūṣitāḥ
rudra akṣa ābharaṇaiḥ yuktāḥ śāntāḥ dāntāḥ jita krudhaḥ

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā cakrurdaityā gṛhe gṛhe |
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā cakruḥ daityāḥ gṛhe gṛhe
vidyunmālī tārakākṣaḥ kamalākṣaḥ ca te trayaḥ
liṅgāni pratigṛhya asmāt sva ucitāni mudā anvitāḥ
pratyekam arcayāmāsuḥ mahā vibhava vistaram
sarve svādhyāya niratāḥ tapasā dagdha kilbiṣāḥ
bhasma rudra akṣa saṃpanna tanavaḥ vijita indriyāḥ
evam arcayatām teṣām āsanna aiśvairya vṛddhayaḥ
loke vede prasiddhāḥ ca śiva pūjā rata ātmanām
taravaḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ ca gṛha ārāma bhavāḥ ca te

original: tasya goṣṭhe sthitā gāvo nandinyaḥ kāmadhenavaḥ |
analyzed: tasya goṣṭhe sthitāḥ gāvaḥ nandinyaḥ kāmadhenavaḥ
cintāmaṇi śilāḥ teṣām prāṅgaṇeṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ
etat pratyarthinām evam eteṣām arcatām śivam
nidhayaḥ ca eva śaṅkha ādyāḥ sannidhim tatra cakrire
gāyantaḥ ca hasantaḥ ca nṛtyantaḥ ca asura uttamāḥ
nitya utsavaḥ abhūt teṣām nitya śrīḥ nitya maṅgalam
ratha nāga turaṅga ādau khelanti sma asura uttamāḥ
ārāmeṣu vicitreṣu vāpīṣu ca sarassu api
nadīnadeṣu sarvatra krīḍantaḥ ninyire samāḥ
amṛta andhobhiḥ aniśam ādṛta ātma kriyāḥ bhṛśam
ramante sma sa patnīkāḥ sura bandibhiḥ ādṛtāḥ

original: taiḥ puraiḥ saha yatrecchā tatra tatra ca remire ||
analyzed: taiḥ puraiḥ saha yatrā icchā tatra tatra ca remire
maṇḍale ca sahasrāṃśoḥ śītāṃśo ṛkṣa madhyame
brahma loke viṣṇu loke bhū loke ca antarikṣake
sura indra loke dikpāla loke sarvatra remire
ye eteṣām adhobhāge syuḥ janāḥ caratām punar
pratimārge ca te sarve vineśuḥ bhaya pīḍitāḥ
tyaktvā brahma viṣṇu ādyāḥ deva sattamāḥ
mahā meru girim prāpya mantrayitvā parasparam
katham ete itra vadhyāḥ syuḥ asmābhiḥ vara garvitāḥ
tān uvāca tatas viṣṇuḥ arcayanti asurāḥ śivam
liṅga arcana parāḥ loke na śakyāḥ jetum ātmabhiḥ
pativratāḥ ca vai teṣām striyaḥ ca pati devatāḥ
tasmāt ajeya tām prāptāḥ asurāḥ balavattarāḥ
tam ūcuḥ amarāḥ sarve bhakti hīnāḥ sura dviṣaḥ
mayasya vacanāt takṣṇaḥ kurvanti ete śiva arcanam
bhakti hīna arcanam śaṃbhoḥ ati prīti karam na vai

original: vayaṃ devaṃ samārādhya sarve cāpi sadāśivam ||
analyzed: vayam devam samārādhya sarve ca api sadāśivam
tatra īśvara ājñā saṃbhūtaiḥ jyeṣyāmaḥ iti tāḥ punar

original: p. 431) tānuvāca haristeṣāṃ na jānīdhve varān surāḥ |
analyzed: tān uvāca hariḥ teṣām na jānīdhve varān surāḥ
ekena eva iṣuṇā nāśaḥ na anyathā yāga saṃbhavaiḥ
upasarjana bhūtaiḥ ca jalpadhve kim vṛthā surāḥ
tam āhuḥ te tu ca evam tad bhūtaiḥ yāga udbhavaiḥ vayam
nirudhya pīḍayiṣyāmaḥ pureṣu yadi śātravān

original: sveṣu sveṣu ca lokeṣu vayaṃ sthātuṃ kṣamāstataḥ ||
analyzed: sveṣu sveṣu ca lokeṣu vayam sthātum kṣamāḥ tatas

original: iti saṃmantrya te sarve devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ |
analyzed: iti saṃmantrya te sarve devāḥ viṣṇu purogamāḥ

original: devān sarvān samāhūya devaiḥ sārdhaṃ janārdanaḥ ||
analyzed: devān sarvān samāhūya devaiḥ sārdham janārdanaḥ
upasadbhiḥ tadā astauṣīt dhyāyan īśam jaya pradam
tadā bhūtāni ca utthasthuḥ mahānti balavanti ca
tāni ca ājñāpayāmāsuḥ saṃbhakṣayata tāḥ puras

original: asuraiḥ saha bhūtāni gacchateti tadā mudā ||
analyzed: asuraiḥ saha bhūtāni gacchata iti tadā mudā
tāni saṃpretya bhūtāni pureṣu pura vāsinaḥ
bhūti rudra akṣa dīpta aṅgān śiva pūjā parāyaṇān
asurān akhilān dṛṣṭvā na āsan jetum kṣamāṇi aho
kevalam punar udyānam abhyetya kapi saṅgha vat
phalāni bhakṣayāmāsuḥ panasa āmra mukhani te
asurāḥ tāni dṛṣṭvā te jaghnuḥ loṣṭhaiḥ ca daṇḍakaiḥ
tatas ca anyonyam abhavat yuddham bhūta suradviṣām
vineśuḥ tāni bhūtāni mahānti api śiva ājñāyā
asurāḥ te punar jñātvā deva ceṣṭām iti īdṛśīm
deva lokeṣu luṇṭhanam cakrire bhṛśam
tatra tatra sthitān devān samājaghnuḥ bala adhikāḥ

original: tataste tatra ye devāḥ prahṛtā asurairbhṛśam ||
analyzed: tatas te tatra ye devāḥ prahṛtāḥ asuraiḥ bhṛśam
śīghram merum samāsādya ca ācakhyuḥ deva sannidhau
tatas ca bhṛśa duḥkha ārtāḥ vibudhāḥ meru gahvare
tasthuḥ anye surāḥ prītyā pureṣu nyavasan tathā
punar ca deva vṛttāntam brahma viṣṇu purogamāḥ
vijñāpanam maheśāya kartum kailāsam āyayuḥ
praṇamya dvāri devasya dvārapālān janārdanaḥ
apṛcchat vibudhaiḥ sārdham deva avasaram ādarāt

original: nāyaṃ vo'vasaro devā gacchateti ca te gaṇāḥ |
analyzed: na ayam vovasaraḥ devāḥ gacchata iti ca te gaṇāḥ
tat upaśrutya vibudhāḥ nā asmākam gatiḥ anyathā
sthāsyāmaḥ uvasaram yāvat tāvat atra eva sannidhau
mantrayitvā iti ca anyonyam uccais hara hara prabho
śaṅkara īśa maheśāna śiva iti parameśvaram
cukruśuḥ te tatas udyamya bāhu dīna svara akṣaram
krośataḥ tān hari brahma pramukhān gaṇa puṅgavāḥ
atāḍayan bhṛśam daṇḍaiḥ vasantaḥ dvārstha saṃmitāḥ
te tāḍyamānāḥ tridaśāḥ vilīnāḥ sarvatas bhṛśam
śanais saraḥ samāseduḥ mānasam mahat adbhutam

original: tatra devā hariṃ procuḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: tatra devāḥ harim procuḥ katham kāryam bhaviṣyati

original: kathaṃ vijñāpanaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ smo devasannidhau ||
analyzed: katham vijñāpanam kartum śaktāḥ smaḥ deva sannidhau

original: sthātuṃ no na sahante'tra dvārapālā mahaujasaḥ |
analyzed: sthātum naḥ na sahanta itra dvārapālāḥ mahā ojasaḥ
tān uvāca hariḥ brahma pramukhān ākulān bhṛśam

original: asmānatra samāsīnān tūṣṇīṃ na praharanti te |
analyzed: asmān atra samāsīnān tūṣṇīm na praharanti te
ākrośataḥ usmān ālokya praharanti eva tādṛśāḥ
ākrośataḥ prabhoḥ dvāri dvār sthāḥ na eva sahiṣṇavaḥ
etat vacaḥ tu te devāḥ samākarṇya atha śārṅgiṇaḥ
bhartsayantaḥ tadā anyonyam papracchuḥ ca punar harim

original: ataḥ paraṃ kathaṃ vā syāddhare'smākaṃ matiṃ vada ||
analyzed: atas param katham vā syāt hare smākam matim vada
tān uvāca hariḥ yūyam eva sarve vicakṣaṇāḥ
brūta buddhiḥ na ca idānīm mama kiṃcid na rocate

original: p. 433) tataściraṃ te pratyekaṃ svaṃ svaṃ samprocire matam |
analyzed: tatas ciram te pratyekam svam svam samprocire matam

original: niścitya ca punaḥ procuḥ sadasyacyutamāśu te ||
analyzed: niścitya ca punar procuḥ sadasya cyutam āśu te
asurāḥ śiva pūjāyām niratāḥ bhūti bhūṣaṇāḥ
rudra akṣa mālā ābharaṇāḥ liṅga arcana parāyaṇāḥ
sarve svādhyāya niratāḥ vaitāna agni samindhakāḥ
pativratāḥ striyaḥ teṣām viśeṣeṇa janārdana

original: naiva śakyā nihantuṃ te yeṣāṃ bhāryāḥ pativratāḥ |
analyzed: na eva śakyāḥ nihantum te yeṣām bhāryāḥ pativratāḥ
śiva bhaktāḥ ca ye loke bhūti rudra akṣa bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: kiṃ tu viṣṇo tvayā śakyā māyayā ditisaṃbhavāḥ |
analyzed: kim tu viṣṇo tvayā śakyāḥ māyayā diti saṃbhavāḥ
tyakta liṅga arcanāḥ ced syuḥ śivaḥ tān saṃhariṣyati
no ced meru guhā asmākam vāsāya bhavati dhruvam
iti bruvatsu deveṣu tān uvāca punar hariḥ

original: ahaṃ yatiṣye tridaśāḥ sādhu yuktamidaṃ mama |
analyzed: aham yatiṣye tridaśāḥ sādhu yuktam idam mama

original: yūyaṃ ca madgirā devaṃ yajadhvaṃ tapasā śivam ||
analyzed: yūyam ca mad girā devam yajadhvam tapasā śivam
saṃhariṣyati tān devaḥ sarvathā parameśvaraḥ
iti nāradam āhūya māyī tripuram āpa saḥ

original: tatra buddhaḥ svayaṃ jajñe viṣṇuḥ śiṣyo'sya nāradaḥ |
analyzed: tatra buddhaḥ svayam jajñe viṣṇuḥ śiṣyaḥ usya nāradaḥ
mohayāmāsatuḥ ca ubhau asurāṇām kulam kṣaṇāt

original: māyāmayena śāstreṇa vācā madhurayā ca tau |
analyzed: māyā mayena śāstreṇa vācā madhurayā ca tau
veṣeṇa ca vicitreṇa bhojana ādyaiḥ ca tādṛśaiḥ
pativratānām strīṇām ca nānā māyā vicakṣaṇau
darśayitvā ca ratnāni divyāni ābharaṇāni ca
pātivratyam ca tāsām tau nāśayāmāsatuḥ girā
sūtaḥśam sam upa
tau dṛṣṭvā tādṛśau pūrvadevāḥ māyā vimohitāḥ
tayoḥ atyanta saṃprītāḥ babhūvuḥ gata cetanāḥ
antevāsinam asya ete nāradam sura śatravaḥ
rahaḥ papracchuḥ āhūya kaḥ asau kasmāt iha āgataḥ
asmad bhāgya vaśāt adya kim āgamana kāraṇam
sa tān uvāca hṛṣṭaḥ yam lokālokaḥ sya vāsa bhūḥ
bhuvana ālokana prītyā saṃcarati ekadā iti

original: yatra svacittaṃ ramate tatra tiṣṭhatyayaṃ vaśī |
analyzed: yatra sva cittam ramate tatra tiṣṭhati ayam vaśī
tatra sthitvā ātma vidyāyāḥ māhātmyam darśayati asau
upadiṣṭāḥ tu yena ena te
śrutvā kecana tad pārśve parivārya upatasthire
teṣām abhīṣṭa jātam ca māyī da tvā vyamohayat
vicitra vastra ābharaṇa dhana dhānya vara aṅganāḥ
tad māhātmya samudbhūta vasūni ādāya gacchataḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā janāścānye svayaṃ cāvṛtya tasthire ||
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā janāḥ ca anye svayam ca āvṛtya tasthire
teṣām api manaḥ bhīṣṭam buddha ācāryaḥ dadau mudā
punar ca nāradam daityāḥ rahasi āhūya sa ādaram
etasya śiṣya bhūtānām evam kim siddhayā udbhutāḥ
bhavanti vā athavā nā evam iti pṛcchatsu teṣu asau
nāradaḥ pratyuvāca enān aham śiṣyeṣu mūḍha dhīḥ

original: mamāpi siddhayaḥ santi yāstāḥ paśyata tatkṣaṇam ||
analyzed: mama api siddhayaḥ santi yāḥ tāḥ paśyata tad kṣaṇam
kamaṇḍaloḥ gṛhītvā ambhaḥ saṃsmaran manasā vaśī

original: tatra brahmā ca viṣṇuśca sarve caiva sthitāḥ surāḥ ||
analyzed: tatra brahmā ca viṣṇuḥ ca sarve ca eva sthitāḥ surāḥ
saṃbabhūvuḥ tad ācāryam praṇemuḥ te ca sādaram
brahma ādīn kṣaṇa mātreṇa kṛtvā ca antarhitān surān
asurebhyaḥ umṛtam bhūri dadau sva mahima āgatam
punar ca yat manaḥ abhīṣṭam dadau śiṣyaḥ usya nāradaḥ
punar ca buddhim daityānām mohayāmāsa māyayā
aprārthayan tadā ca asya śiṣya bhāvam diteḥ sutāḥ

original: p. 435) nāradaḥ sa tu tatsarvaṃ vijñāpya gurave mudā |
analyzed: nāradaḥ sa tu tat sarvam vijñāpya gurave mudā
śiṣyān tān kārayāmāsa bahuśas prārthayan gurum
śikṣayāmāsa tān etān sadyas tyakta śiva arcanān
teṣām ca upadideśa asau mām eva bhajata asurāḥ

original: ahaṃ buddho'smi vai nāmnā mannāmno'stu japastu vaḥ |
analyzed: aham buddhaḥ asmi vai nāmnā mad nāmnoḥ tu japaḥ tu vaḥ
mad arcaya eva yuṣmākam abhīṣṭa phala siddhayaḥ

original: iha loke tu yaddṛṣṭaṃ tadevāmutra yanmṛṣā |
analyzed: iha loke tu yat dṛṣṭam tat eva amutra yat mṛṣā

original: śivapūjā na vai kāryā na dhāryāstu vibhūtayaḥ ||
analyzed: śiva pūjā na vai kāryā na dhāryāḥ tu vibhūtayaḥ
na ca rudrākṣa bījāni mithyā veda girāḥ ukhilāḥ

original: etatsarvaṃ parityaktaṃ yaiste śiṣyā na cetare ||
analyzed: etat sarvam parityaktam yaiḥ te śiṣyāḥ na ca itare

original: teṣāṃ naiva ca sidhdyanti siddhayaḥ sarvathaihikāḥ |
analyzed: teṣām nā eva ca sidhdyanti siddhayaḥ sarvathā aihikāḥ
iti tasya girā sarve parityakta śiva arcanāḥ
tathā saṃtyakta rudra akṣa vibhūti śiva śāsanāḥ
pativratāḥ striyaḥ tāḥ ca nāradena vimohitāḥ
babhūvaḥ satatam mohāt jāra āsaktāḥ yathāsukham
tasya māyā samudbhūta vastra ābharaṇa kāṅkṣayā
tāḥ ca tyakta śiva ācārāḥ gṛha kuḍya ādi upāsakāḥ
saṃmārjanī arcanā niṣṭhāḥ puṃścalyaḥ utha divāniśam
tadānīm nāradam buddha rūpaḥ viṣṇuḥ apṛcchata
asurāṇām kulam kṛtsnam asmad māyā vaśam nu kim
nāryaḥ ca jāra āsaktāḥ nu māyayā mohita antarāḥ

original: iti pṛṣṭastadā prāha nāradaḥ praṇipatya tam ||
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ tadā prāha nāradaḥ praṇipatya tam
māyayā mohitāḥ svāmin atyartham asura adhamāḥ
puratrayeṣu ca ekaikam vinādya madhusūdana
ekaḥ parama yogya nyaḥ tu ekaḥ śīla paraḥ smṛtaḥ
virakta ākhyaḥ ca yogi anyaḥ trayaḥ pāśupata uttamāḥ
upamanyoḥ bhṛgoḥ ca api dadhīcāt api tedhikāḥ
agastyāt api ca śreṣṭhāḥ śiva bhakti parāyaṇāḥ
trayaḥ ca ete mahātmānaḥ śiva anugraha bhāginaḥ
asmad māyā na badhnāti visa tantuḥ iva dvipān
nārada uktam vacaḥ śruṇvan anusmṛtya hariḥ hṛdā
tebhyaḥ tān aparān prāha na saṃbhāṣyāḥ trayaḥ api amī
yuṣmābhiḥ mad girā śiṣyaiḥ mad priyaiḥ bhūti kāṅkṣibhiḥ
taiḥ sākam kalahaḥ mā astu śiva pūjā paraiḥ tribhiḥ
iti sarvān mahā viṣṇuḥ mohayitvā sva māyayā
sva aṃśam anyam pratiṣṭhāpya buddham buddhi vimohakam
nāradam ca samāhūya nirjagāma puratrayāt
tatas kailāsam acalam ārurukṣuḥ samīpa gaḥ
na śaśāka sa devarṣiḥ duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
āroḍhum tam giri śreṣṭham āgasvī garuḍadhvajaḥ
asmābhiḥ sura kārya artham asurāḥ nāstikāḥ kṛtāḥ
vihīnāḥ bhasma rudra akṣa śiva arcābhiḥ kṛtāḥ ime

original: tena doṣastu sumahān sañjāto'tra na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: tena doṣaḥ tu su mahān sañjātaḥ atra na saṃśayaḥ
sa doṣaiḥ nā eva śakyaḥ śrī kailāsaḥ smartum ātmabhiḥ
iti tad doṣa śānti artham īśam uddiśya keśavaḥ
nāradena atapat tīvram tapaḥ dhyāyan hṛdā īśvaram
tatas prasannaḥ bhagavān śaṅkaraḥ loka śaṃkaraḥ
viṣṇum sa nāradam prāha megha gambhīrayā girā
aho dhiddhik yuvām mūḍhau sura kārya artham api ayam
mad bhaktaiḥ mocitaḥ mārgaḥ bhavadbhyām aviśaṅkayā
